content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation; electrical id: 2136).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network, now identified as ElectricityGroup with id=2136 (voltage=0).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at positions 
(Boiler: -6.0, 24.5; Offshore Pump: -9.5, 24.5; Steam Engine: 2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_systems: [6300]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_systems: [6300]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5)).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6300 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6301 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6302 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6307 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6306 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6311 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6310 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6313 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- Electricity Network: ElectricityGroup with id=2136 connecting poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System Selection for Steam Engine Water Supply:
  - Repeated connection attempts using non-working fluid_system IDs [5956, 5999, 6042, 6085, 6128, 6171, 6214, 6257] have been logged. Use the working PipeGroup provided by the water extraction setup—associated with fluid_system=6300—to supply water to the steam engine.
  
• Pipeline Network Alignment:
  - Ensure that all pipe connection points and intermediate segments are precisely aligned and free from obstructions to allow effective fluid transfer.
  
• Steam Engine and Power Network Configuration:
  - Verify that the steam engine is connected to both the working pipeline (fluid_system=6300) and the updated power network (ElectricityGroup with id=2136).
